title: Kroger recruits Ocado's robot army
text:
Kroger recruits Ocado's robot army 6:24am EDT - 00:45
Shares in British home-delivery service Ocado have rocketed after announcing a deal with U.S. retailer Kroger to provide tech knowhow including its robots that can pack and process orders. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
Shares in British home-delivery service Ocado have rocketed after announcing a deal with U.S. retailer Kroger to provide tech knowhow including its robots that can pack and process orders.
